#2.12
Healthwise Work Habits
During intense computer work, its healthy to perform non-computer related work at least 10 minutes every hour.

Exercises also help relieve muscle tension, but if you have any injuries, please consult your physician before trying any exercises.  If you experience any discomfort during exercise, stop immediately and consult your physician.
Click on the red spots to see an exercise for that part of the body.  The red spots in this picture show potential areas of discomfort.
